snippet: The proposed $1.9 billion takeover of EMI's recorded-music division by Universal Music Group has been criticized by advocacy groups and rival music labels as resulting in too much market concentration.
abstract: The proposed $1.9 billion takeover of EMI's recorded-music division by Universal Music Group has been criticized by advocacy groups and rival music labels as resulting in too much market concentration.

headline.main: Senate to Hold Antitrust Hearings on Universal-EMI Deal
headline.print_headline: Media: Senate Panel Plans Hearings On Music Acquisition
